note: Ritesh Patil is the co-founder of Mobisoft Infotech that helps startups and enterprises in mobile technology. He loves technology, especially mobile technology.

name: Taxi Pulse
value: Taxi Pulse is a white-label taxi dispatch software solution to automate and streamline the fleet business of all sizes. This feature-packed solution allows manual and automatic dispatching, fleet management, real-time tracking, and much more. Taxi Pulse h
